tracks.text: Jimmy brandishes a baseball bat.
Young Petey smiles and runs.
Intro
Agent McCool rides his white horse at full gallop. McCool wears a red coat with 3 chevrons, a broad rimmed hat, and has a knee-length bulge between his legs.
He rides through the woods, behind a house, down an urban city street, and leaps off the edge of a lifted highway, and lands in a parking lot. Jimmy sits dejectedly on the hood of a car.
Typed text. RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool and this is the last time we're telling you.
Not because we don't want to, but because our typist is going to Hawaii.
Horse
At the house
Gina slaps Theresa
Gina narrows her eyes. Theresa scoots away.
He carries a toaster. At night, at the provincial legislature building, Jimmy, Cheech, and 3 men play poker.
The redheaded Premiere gestures to a pile of classified documents, cash, and red stripe beer.
A First Nation man pulls in chips. McCool watches, sweating.
Horse frowns.
Horse glares.

McCool springs cards from one hand to the other, juggles them in a circle, stops them on one hand, and rolls the cards across his shoulders to the other hand. Jimmy and Cheech gape. He springs the cards into a 3 level house, blows it down, plucks the cards out of the air, combines them into a deck, and springs the cards in front of the players.
Premiere
Shwa
Everyone folds. McCool pulls the chip stack.
McCool narrows his eyes. Jimmy looks away, back, at his cards. He smiles.
McCool looks around. Everyone wears glasses. Jimmy's are goofy, Shwa's is 3D, Premiere's is large, First Nation's is a giant Mayan mask, Cheech's are mirrored.
Horse rears up. Jimmy falls back.
At the house
He mimes holding horse reins and jumps away. Horse glares.
Diner. Open 24 hours. McCool wears a hair net and stares blankly. He flips a burger onto a plate and rings a bell.
McCool walks down the street, holding 12 dogs' leashes. He sits in a cubicle, talking on the phone.
Kids run around, scream, and climb on McCool. They draw on his face.
In the parking lot, a dejected McCool hands an envelope to Jimmy.
Jimmy wearily shakes his head. Horse looks worried. McCool droops his head and turns around. He's carrying 3 babies on his back.
McCool pedals down a rode, carrying newspaper in a backpack.
Naked, he counts cash. He stares forward, grimaces, and spreads his legs, revealing massive censorship.
The photo is the front cover of Hustlette Magazine.
At the house, Cheech carries the magazine.
Cheech
Petey hides his face. Jimmy and Cheech approach a log cabin.
He goes inside. Jimmy and Cheech follow.
A squirrel on the table turns to us with an intense expression.
Jimmy's house, at night.
Cookie looks at the magazine.
At a street corner
He washes a windshield
A man holds the Hustlette magazine
Jimmy digs in the yeard
They drop a bag of money in front of the house and hide in the bushes.
Cookie glares, and Horse moves off the couch. Cookie sits.
Jimmy walks down the sidewalk with Horse.
Regina Raceway
Horse pulls away. Lineup: Doughal, Mustard, Diligence, Ointment, Gasoline, Wheezer, Continence, Doo Hickey, Space for Rent, That's So Wrong. Horse rides That's So Wrong.
At the finish line, 2 horses stand on 2 legs, wearing bikinis. Cheech drinks from a large bottle. He looks at a blond bikini horse.
McCool operates a machine on a factory line.
He looks up. Horse carries a satchel in his mouth, wearing the mountie hat.
The factory workers turn and watch Horse approach McCool.
McCool jumps into Horse's arms, and Horse princess carries him away while the other workers applaud.
McCool hands the satchel to Jimmy.
Credits roll
